description: UMD 1.10.1 is an emergency release for &nbsp;UMD 1.10.0 (Unified Middleware Distribution) &nbsp;release &nbsp;made available for the EGI production infrastructure. This release only supports Scientific Linux 5.
releaseNotes: <div>This release contains the following products:</div><div><b>Job Execution</b><br></div><div>EMI Technology Provider:<br></div><div><ul><li>jclassads 2.4.3&nbsp;Java implementation of Condor Classified Advertisements (classads) used for describing jobs, workstations, and other resources. This release includes libraries needed to satisfy emi-wn dependencies.</li></ul></div><div><ul><li>CREAM 1.13.5 released in SL5:&nbsp;The release is a simple repackaging necessary in order to include the new version of VOMS java APIs v. 2.0.9. This release also includes the EMI CEMon v1.13.4&nbsp;and solves a security vulnerability found which can be consulted at the appropriate time at :&nbsp;<a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/SVG:Advisory-SVG-2012-4598">SVG-2012-4598</a></li></ul></div>
installationNotes: All products in the UMD 1.10.1 release were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria (for further information, please see the documentation links) to support 64 bit Scientific Linux 5 (x86_64 processor architecture). Installation and configuration notes are available in the <a href="http://repository.egi.eu/category/umd_releases/distribution/umd_1/">EGI repository</a>.
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: <div>For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="http://ggus.eu">EGI Helpdesk</a> to make a report.<br></div><br/>
knownIssues: Details containing known issues and workarounds found in EGI verification and staged rollout are collected in: <a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-1:UMD-1.10.1">https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-1:UMD-1.10.1</a>
changeLog: <div>UMD 1.10.1 contains a release for EMI CREAM which solves some security vulnerabilities issues.</div><br><div>UMD-1.10.1 Products</div><div><ul><li>EMI CREAM 1.13.5<br></li><li>jclassads 2.4.3&nbsp;</li></ul><br/></div>

products.name: emi.cream
products.releaseNotes:
What's new



The release is a simple repackaging necessary in order to include the new version of VOMS java APIs v. 2.0.9.

The new security library solves a vulnerability bug

For the vulnerability solved more information will be published when appropriate at this URL: - https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/SVG:Advisory-SVG-2012-4598

products.name: emi.jclassads
products.description: Java implementation of Condor Classified Advertisements (classads) used for describing jobs, workstations, and other resources.
products.releaseNotes: jclassads  libraries needed to satisfy emi-wn dependencies
products.changeLog: jclassads  libraries needed to satisfy emi-wn dependencies
